alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wallace and southwestern Logan Counties through 500 PM MDT/600 PM CDT/... At 412 PM MDT/512 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Sharon Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wallace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
